name: Morton's Magical Adventure
description: Morton's Magical Adventure is a 2D Platformer game where you play as Morton the Magical man and need to enter the magical portals to progress throught the dream world that Melvin the Maniacal Man, Morton's arch nemesis. To progress through the levels you must defeat platforming challenges such asjumping from platform to platform or creatively using your few jumps to go under obstacles. You must also defeat the mirror images that Melvin has inhabited the world with by shooting them with your magic blast. Be careful after you hit them because they will continue to pursue you even in the middle of being blown up, only stopping after they are reduced to nothing.
